00020 namespace boost {
00021 namespace xint {
00022 
00027 bool getbit(const nothrow_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00028     try {
00029         return getbit(xint::integer(n), bit);
00030     } catch (std::exception&) {
00031         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00032         else return false;
00033     }
00034 }
00035 
00037 void setbit(nothrow_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00038     try {
00039         xint::integer nn(n);
00040         setbit(nn, bit);
00041         n=nothrow_integer(nn);
00042     } catch (std::exception&) {
00043         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00048 void clearbit(nothrow_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00049     try {
00050         xint::integer nn(n);
00051         clearbit(nn, bit);
00052         n=nothrow_integer(nn);
00053     } catch (std::exception&) {
00054         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00062 size_t lowestbit(const nothrow_integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00063     try {
00064         return lowestbit(xint::integer(n), valueIfZero);
00065     } catch (std::exception&) {
00066         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00067         else return 0;
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00075 size_t highestbit(const nothrow_integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00076     try {
00077         return highestbit(xint::integer(n), valueIfZero);
00078     } catch (std::exception&) {
00079         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00080         else return 0;
00081     }

00085 nothrow_integer bitwise_and(const nothrow_integer& n1, const nothrow_integer& n2) {
00086     try {
00087         return nothrow_integer(bitwise_and(xint::integer(n1), xint::integer(n2)));
00088     } catch (std::exception&) {
00089         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00090         else return nothrow_integer::nan();
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00095 nothrow_integer bitwise_or(const nothrow_integer& n1, const nothrow_integer& n2) {
00096     try {
00097         return nothrow_integer(bitwise_or(xint::integer(n1), xint::integer(n2)));
00098     } catch (std::exception&) {
00099         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00100         else return nothrow_integer::nan();
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00105 nothrow_integer bitwise_xor(const nothrow_integer& n1, const nothrow_integer& n2) {
00106     try {
00107         return nothrow_integer(bitwise_xor(xint::integer(n1), xint::integer(n2)));
00108     } catch (std::exception&) {
00109         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00110         else return nothrow_integer::nan();
00111     }
00112 }
00113 
00115 nothrow_integer shift(const nothrow_integer& n, int byBits) {
00116     if (byBits > 0) return shift_left(n, byBits);
00117     else return shift_right(n, -byBits);
00118 }
00119 
00121 nothrow_integer shift_left(const nothrow_integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00122     try {
00123         return nothrow_integer(shift_left(xint::integer(n), byBits));
00124     } catch (std::exception&) {
00125         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00126         else return nothrow_integer::nan();
00127     }
00128 }
00129 
00131 nothrow_integer shift_right(const nothrow_integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00132     try {
00133         return nothrow_integer(shift_right(xint::integer(n), byBits));
00134     } catch (std::exception&) {
00135         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00136         else return nothrow_integer::nan();
00137     }
00138 }
